00027 template < class Container >
00028 std::list<CgSegmt> alpha_edges_user( Container cgPoints, erAlphaP* param)
00029 {
00030   double alfa;
00031   std::list<CgSegmt> cgSegment;
00032   typedef typename Container::iterator it;
00033   int ok =1;
00034   while(ok)
00035     {
00036       std::cout << std::endl;
00037       std::cout << "Value of alpha parameter to Alpha Shape (double v | v>0) ";
00038       std::cin >> alfa;
00039       Alpha_shape_2 A( cgPoints.begin(), cgPoints.end(), CgFTrai(alfa));
00040       for(Alpha_shape_edges_iterator it =  A.alpha_shape_edges_begin(); it != A.alpha_shape_edges_end(); ++it)
00041         {
00042           cgSegment.push_back( A.segment(*it));
00043         }
00044       ok = 0;
00045     }
00046   param->alpha = alfa;
00047   return cgSegment;
00048 }

00053 template < class Container >
00054 std::list<CgSegmt> alpha_edges( Container cgPoints, erAlphaP* param)
00055 {
00056   double alfa = param->alpha;
00057   typedef typename Container::iterator it;
00058   
00059   Alpha_shape_2 A( cgPoints.begin(), cgPoints.end(), CgFTrai(alfa));
00060   std::list<CgSegmt> cgSegment;
00061   for(Alpha_shape_edges_iterator it =  A.alpha_shape_edges_begin(); it != A.alpha_shape_edges_end(); ++it)
00062     {
00063       cgSegment.push_back( A.segment(*it));
00064     }
00065   
00066   return cgSegment;
